pros: Curved design offers a modern look
A definite step up from your TV's built-in speakers

customer_reviews.title: Bass distortion at medium volumes
customer_reviews.text: The ATS-1060 sounds good at low to low/medium volumes. Crank it a little bit, especially in Bass Assist mode, and the low end drivers produce a very annoying buzz/ distortion. Yamaha clearly knows how to produce the drivers - these guys move a lot of air - but they didn't house them properly or perhaps power them properly. Also found what others have found - one needs to be directly in front of the unit to get the remote to function properly. In addition, there are times when the app just doesn't control the unit. Yes, my Bluetooth is on and WAS paired. I could live with the finicky remote, but the distorted bass makes this a return for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Beeman

customer_reviews.title: GREAT sounding 2.1 sound bar from Yamaha
customer_reviews.text: Ok this sound bar is the model from a couple of years ago so I bought 2 of them recently dirt cheap on Amazon. The condition listed was "used - very good" but they were more like "used - like new". Great sound, great functionality especially when used with an HDMI (ARC) input on the TV. It's not a substitute for a Home Theater setup but GREATLY improves the sound compared to internal TV speakers -- there's bass now! As of April 2019 you can still pick up "used - very good" ones with "Fulfillment by Amazon" for 1/4 the original price. The newer models have better Bluetooth, that's the only difference I can find over the ATS-1060.
customer_reviews.author: Rmae

customer_reviews.title: Very good sound bar

customer_reviews.title: Best Bang For Your Buck
customer_reviews.text: Love this. It replaced an aging Yamaha 5.1 amp setup and now that I have had it a few weeks I can honestly say that I notice very little difference between the two. The surround is not quite as good, (simply because the speaker can't project sound behind you), but the quality is great, the volume is ample for my medium sized living room, and I have even turned down the bass. Plenty good for my needs, no separate woofer is required. Nice rich sound and a quality product. From everything I see on the spec sheet, this is identical to the YAS-106, but for less money. Bargain.

customer_reviews.title: ATS 1060 vs ATS 1050
customer_reviews.text: I own this Yamaha ATS 1060 and also a ATS 1050. The ATS 1060 offers more input/output possibilities. The ATS 1050 delivers a bit of more bass, however the ATS 1060 sound is more balanced, more detailed and with a small sub woofer the sound is better in comparison to its older brother the ATS1050. IMHO Both are excelent systems to replace your TV speakers and to be used in small spaces. Combined with a small external subwoofer you have it all. And the app, works excelent I compared the Yamaha sound bar vs Bose, Polk and Jbl. Yamaha is the best value hands down and sounds is excellent. You wont be disapointed.

product_meta.title: Yamaha ATS-1060 Sound Bar with Dual Built-In Subwoofers
product_meta.description: The Easy Way to Enjoy Great TV Sound Enhance your favorite shows and music with clear, full-range sound from this sleek sound bar featuring built-in subwoofers. Its ultra slim design fits neatly in front of your TV, on a shelf or can be mounted to a wall. Bluetooth wireless technology lets you stream music from your iPhone, iPad and Android devices. Clear, Full-Range Sound: As TVs have gotten thinner and thinner, so has the sound quality from their built-in speakers. This single piece sound bar makes it easier than ever to enhance your TV sound, so you can hear all the details of your favorite shows and movies. It's also great for listening to music. Deep, Rich Bass from Dual Built-In Subwoofers: The ATS-1060 is equipped with dual, built-in subwoofers plus a unique bass reflex port and "Bass Extension" processing to deliver exceptional low-end performance without the need for a separate subwoofer box. For those who crave even more, a subwoofer output lets you hook up an optional powered subwoofer. Ultra-Slim and Wall Mountable: At just a touch over two inches tall, this soundbar fits in front of most TVs without blocking the screen. If you prefer to wall-mount it, the ATS-1060 offers a flexible orientation with built-in keyholes, and it automatically adjusts the sound profile based on your desired placement type. Bluetooth Wireless Music Streaming: Fill your home with music the quick and easy way! Stream from Bluetooth compatible smartphones and tablets. You can play audio from many apps and streaming music services. Home Theater Controller App: The ATS-1060 is compatible with a free controller app for iOS and Android. The intuitive and easy-to-see operating screen uses icons that let you easily perform a variety of operations. You can also select five surround modes: Movie, Sports, Game, Music, or TV. Compressed Music Enhancer: restores frequency response lost during digital compression, so your music sounds the way it should.
feature_bullets: Ultra slim design perfectly complements the look of your TV. The ATS-1060 has one HDMI input and one HDMI output. It supports 4K / 60p (4:2:0) video signal pass-through and HDCP 2.2 digital copy protection, making it compatible with the latest sources and TVs. Also, the HDMI output supports Audio Return Channel (ARC), which simplifies connectivity with compatible TVs.

Deep, rich bass from dual built-in subwoofers. Home Theater Controller App: The ATS-1060 is compatible with a free controller app for iOS and Android. The intuitive and easy-to-see operating screen uses icons that let you easily perform a variety of operations. You can also select five surround modes: Movie, Sports, Game, Music, or TV.

Place it on furniture or mount it to a wall. Clear Voice raises the level of dialogue and narrations while maintaining overall sound quality. Movies and TV shows, sports commentary and news broadcasts are more clearly audible.

Bluetooth wireless music streaming from a smartphone or tablet. The Compressed Music Enhancer restores frequency response lost during digital compression, so your music sounds the way it should. Optimized for Bluetooth audio transmission, you'll enjoy vivid, lively sound quality during wireless playback.
Simple setup with HDMI, optical or analog connection. Use a single optical cable (included) to connect the soundbar to your TV, or use an HDMI cable for best performance.
